name: USP Token
public_notice: United States Property Coin (USPC) has rebranded to USP Token (USP). For more information, please view this announcement.

description.en: USP is a real estate-backed cryptocurrency designed to offer fractional ownership in an income-producing real estate portfolio, as well as being the issuer of USPC, a superior stablecoin backed by a 2:1 ratio of real estate and cash reserves. USP's objective is to deliver risk-adjusted, high returns for investors, enabling USP token holders globally to safeguard their savings, outpace inflation, and build generational wealth.
